welcome_message_body: "Welcome to General Pacheco, Argentina! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and charm of our city, known for its beautiful parks and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that General Pacheco has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction at El Palomar Airport, expected to open in 2022.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.
